document_data.name: Estah
document_data.mainbody: '''Estah''' was the [[halfling]] proprietor of the [[Sign of the Dreaming Dragon]] inn in [[Iriaebor]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was also part of the [[Fellowship of the Dreaming Dragon]]. She was a healer and a priest of [[Eldath]].
document_data.Description: She had deep brown eyes, a broad, rosy-cheeked face, and she wore a gray homespun [[apron]]. She stood as high as [[Kellen Caldorien]]'s shoulders.<ref>
document_data.Possessions: She owned a silver amulet that was engraved with the symbol of Eldath, given to her by her mother.<ref>
document_data.Personality: She was a kind and joyous woman and never turned away someone in need.
document_data.Relationships: Estah was married to [[Jolle]]. They married a few years after the fellowship disbanded and they had two children. The eldest was their daughter [[Pog]], who was mischievous and beautiful. Her younger brother [[Nog]] was a round-cheeked boy who spoke a language only his parents could understand. They stood up to Caledan Caldorien's knees.<ref>
document_data.History:
She originally hailed from [[Corm Orp]].<ref>

She purchased the inn in Iriaebor that became known as the Sign of the Dreaming Dragon in the 1350s DR.<ref>

She met [[Caledan Caldorien]] when he passed through town on his first [[Harper]] mission and became close friends. She was the first one to join Caledan on his adventures.<ref>
